alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 10:03AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Arapahoe, Denver, northeastern Jefferson and western Adams Counties through 1045 AM MDT... At 1001 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over western Denver, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail, and brief light to moderate rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Denver, Aurora, northeastern Lakewood, Thornton, southeastern Arvada, Westminster, southern Broomfield, Commerce City, Northglenn, Brighton, northern Englewood, Wheat Ridge, Federal Heights, Denver International Airport, D.I.A Terminal and Concourses, Watkins, Buckley SFB and Barr Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
